extension.description: Emulator for MSX/SVI/ColecoVision/SG-1000 by Daniel Vik[CR]Supported files: rom|ri|mx1|mx2|col|dsk|cas|sg|sc|m3u[CR][CR]Game Addon Notes: (!) The libretro port of blueMSX requires the BIOS files|from full standalone package inside the 'System\Machines' directory |and media database files into 'System\Databases' directory.|https://docs.libretro.com/library/bluemsx/#bios|(!) ColecoVision Gamepad Mapping is as follow:|Button 1 as Retropad A|Button 2 as Retropad B|Dial keys 1 to 8 as X, Y, R, L, R2, L2, R3, L3|Star as Select, Hash as Start|0 & 9 are on keyboard 1 & 2 for Player 1|0 & 9 are on keyboard 3 & 4 for Player 2.|(!) To play SpectraVideo cassettes type 'cload' then 'run'|or BLOAD ''CAS:'',R depending of game.

Emulator for Super Nintendo Entertainment System by Near|Alcaro[CR]Supported files: sfc|smc|bml[CR][CR]Game Addon Notes: [1] bsnes-mercury Performance uses split ROMS for special chip games.|[*] Notable DSP1/DSP1B Games: Super Mario Kart, Pilotwings|[*] Notable DSP2 Games: Dungeon Master|[*] Notable DSP3 Games: SD Gundam GX|[*] Notable DSP4 Games: Top Gear 3000|[2] Emulation for Cx4 games is broken.
